roleset.name: move from one level to the next

example.name: show-off
example.text: Moving rapidly through school , he graduated Phi Beta Kappa from the University of Kentucky at age 18 , after spending only 2 1/2 years in college .

propbank.arg: after spending only 2 1/2 years in college

example.name: why didn't I think of this?
example.text: Families that do not need the loan can make money simply by putting the loan in the bank and paying it back when the student graduates .

example.name: apparently passive
example.text: No student should be permitted to be graduated from elementary school without having mastered the 3 R 's at the level that prevailed 20 years ago .

propbank.arg: without having mastered the 3 R 's at the level that prevailed 20 years ago

example.name: with ArgA
example.text: Penn graduates only 59 % of its incoming freshman class .

propbank.arg: only 59 % of its incoming freshman class

example.name: Arg0, 1
example.text: Thompson Boxing Promotions congratulates " King " Artemio Reyes on his graduation from Riverside Community College .
